fields.name: TOM FORD Leather Trimmed Cotton-Velvet Padded Quilted Down Jacket
fields.description: TOM FORD knows how to make outerwear refined and sophisticated. This black down jacket is made from plush cotton-velvet and trimmed with tonal leather for a subtle textural contrast. The hood is handily detachable so you can streamline your look when it's dry out" 100% Cotton

fields.name: Gucci GG Rhombus Vacation Shirt
fields.description: Inspired by horse racing, Gucci’s latest collection is a colourful line-up of clobber that includes this vacation shirt which pays tribute to the uniforms worn by jockeys. Expertly crafted in Italy from pure silk, its lightweight and breathable ground serves as a canvas for the multi-coloured geometric print. Detailed with the label’s iconic interlocking G’s throughout, this relaxed style is definitely one to place your bet on." inseam polyester/rayon/spandex washable imported

fields.name: Lanvin White Calfskin Curb Sneakers
fields.description: Low-top mesh and grained calfskin sneakers in white. Perforated detailing and rubberized trim in black at round toe. Lace-up closure. Embossed logo and rubberized pull-tab at padded tongue. Suede trim in grey at sides. Rubberized patch in black at heel counter. Crepe rubber midsole in yellow. Treaded rubber outsole in grey. Silver-tone hardware. Supplier color: White

fields.name: Yves Salomon - Shearling Coat
fields.description: You'll be so thankful of investing in this Yves Salomon coat once the weather starts to bite. It's cut from plush, insulating shearling in a comfortable profile that hits about the knee. It's partially lined for ease of layering and resilience.

fields.name: Bottega Veneta Leather Chelsea Boots
fields.description: Bottega Veneta's leather boots take practical elements from motorcycle, Chelsea and wellington styles. Designed with elasticated sides and double pull tabs, this Italian-made pair has robust rubber-lug soles and hit about mid-calf, so they'll work particularly well with slim trousers.

fields.name: AMIRI - Wide-Leg Denim Jeans
fields.description: AMIRI may be known for its super skinny jeans, but this wide-leg pair proves it handles the relaxed look just as well. They're cut from Italian denim and have a classic blue wash with authentic fading and whiskers in all the right places.

fields.name: Off-White  Logo-Jacquard Mohair-Blend Sweater
fields.description: Off-White's sweater is jacquard-woven with two of the brand's signatures - packaging tape-inspired stripes along the sleeves and four distinctive arrows on the back. Knitted from fuzzy mohair-blend, it's shaped for a relaxed fit and framed with neatly ribbed trims to hold its structure.
